sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-category', templateUrl: './category.component.html', styleUrls: ['./category.component.css'], }) export class CategoryComponent { category = [ { id: 1, title: 'Computer' }, { id: 2, title: 'Gadgets' }, { id: 3, title: 'Keyboards' }, { id: 4, title: 'Phones' }, ]; }
